alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Shawano; Waupaca (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 11:31AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN PORTAGE... SOUTHEASTERN MARATHON...NORTHWESTERN WAUPACA AND SOUTHWESTERN SHAWANO COUNTIES THROUGH 1215 PM CDT... At 1131 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amherst, or 13 miles east of Stevens Point, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Amherst, Stockton, Manawa, Iola, Tigerton, Jordan, Rosholt, Sheridan, Amherst Junction, Scandinavia, Peru, Ogdensburg, Nelsonville, Big Falls, Schmidt Corner, North Star, Holt, Ellis, and Whitcomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
